item.title: How I picked March Madness 2021
item.description: I feel that I know a lot about College Basketball, but when it comes down to March Madness, I seem to figure out that I have won by the slimmest of margins. Simply put, I am lucky with winning this. I usually look to into detail at teams that are getting hot at the right time. Also I have picked based on coaches in March. With this model, I see that I have chosen very wrong, but letâ€™s see what where It will go.
